wikitext.*:
'''Zaragamba''' is the actual name of the [[Hobbitish]] old family-name "[[Oldbuck Family|Oldbuck]]". 

When [[Gorhendad Oldbuck|Gorhendad]], travelled east and founded [[Buckland]] on the Shire's borders, the family name changed to ''[[Brandagamba]]''.
==Etymology==
The name contains the elements ''[[zara]]'', "old" and ''[[gamba]]'', "buck".<ref name="AppF">{{App|F2}}</ref>
